name: NeON (itch) (cacheira, Pedro Alcoforado)
description:
Traverse the city of Nihong using your parkour skills while defeating the “shadow people” who are trying to take out all light and uncovering who’s behind it all!

CREDITS

Programming:
Pedro Alcoforado
Ricardo Cacheira

Artwork:
Francisca Alves
Inês Cunha
Marina Variadaki
Matilde Raposo
Rita Gonçalves

This game was done as part of the 4th semester of the Games and Apps Development course at Universidade Europeia in the span of 2~3 months.
